main event: A civilian observed a UFO that resembled an inverted raindrop, moving slowly east over Boonville, Missouri on April 7, 1958.
interesting points: The object was shaped like an inverted raindrop and about the size of a grapefruit., The color of the object changed from white to red., The observer used binoculars to view the object., The observation was made at 8:20 AM local time and was still in sight at the time of reporting., The report indicated insufficient data for further evaluation.
